availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles P. Gray (Clinton County, KY, clerk)

body.p:
Clinton County, Kentucky, clerk. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth A. Gray. Father of Rhoda C. Gray, Lucy G. Gray, Mary F. Gray, William N. Gray, Shelby C. Gray and Susan H. Gray
School teacher in Clinton County in 1850. Clerk of Clinton County Court in 1860. Clerk of Clinton County Court in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District 1, p. 161B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, p. 161.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, Albany District 1, p. 266A.
Paula Corregan and James Pylant, eds., Abstracts of Clinton County, Kentucky, Circuit Court Orders, vol. 1 (Stephenville, TX: Datatrace Systems, 2003), 119.
Find A Grave, "C. P. Gray (1819-1890)," Memorial #63210399, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/63210399 (accessed February 13, 2020).
